patthana14.15:1.1_0: Āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:1.1_1: Āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:1.1_2: Āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā
patthana14.15:2.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:2.1_1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:2.1_2: Āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā
patthana14.15:3.1_0: Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati
patthana14.15:3.1_1: hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto
patthana14.15:3.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana14.15:3.1_3: naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.15:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
